name: Wasteland Warrior
description: A battle-hardened survivor who has conquered the harsh wastelands

name: Mutant Scout
description: A mutated survivor adapted to the radioactive wilderness

name: Cyberpunk Survivor
description: A tech-enhanced survivor navigating the ruins of civilization

name: Desert Nomad
description: A wandering survivor who roams the endless desert wastes

name: Raider Leader
description: A fierce leader commanding respect through strength and cunning

name: Gas Mask Mercenary
description: A mysterious mercenary protected from toxic air and danger

name: Tech Salvager
description: A resourceful scavenger who recovers technology from the old world

name: Radiation Hunter
description: A fearless hunter who tracks prey through radioactive zones

name: Scavenger Queen
description: A powerful leader ruling over a network of scavengers

name: Nomadic Healer
description: A compassionate healer traveling to aid survivors in need

name: Rusted Soldier
description: A weathered soldier still fighting in worn and rusted armor

name: Bunker Survivor
description: A cautious survivor emerging from the safety of underground shelters

name: Toxic Wastelander
description: A survivor immune to toxins prowling the most dangerous zones

name: Rebel Engineer
description: A brilliant engineer building machines from salvaged parts

name: Ashland Hunter
description: A skilled hunter tracking dangerous prey through ash-covered lands

name: Steel Mask Raider
description: An intimidating raider concealed behind a steel mask
